name: TSIOQUE - Digital Artbook
detailed_description:
A companion to Ohnoo and Smile's new point and click adventure game sensation, TSIOQUE Artbook now offers a deeper, almost intimate look inside the creative process behind the game.



A carefully picked collection of hundreds of sketches, concept arts and illustrations, this 64-page Artbook is a journal of almost 6 years of TSIOQUE's development, from early concepts and animation roughs to final in-game and promotional art.

It's highly recommended you finish the game before reading - expect spoilers, lots of them.



Enjoy your read!

short_description: A carefully picked collection of hundreds of sketches, concept arts and illustrations, this 64-page Artbook is a journal of almost 6 years of TSIOQUE's development, from early concepts and animation roughs to final in-game and promotional art.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2.2 GHz, AMD Athlon™ X2 2.4 GHz, or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2.4 GHz, AMD Athlon™ X2 2.4 GHz, or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard 10.6.3 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Snow Leopard 10.6.3 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
